1.name: 1. Perry Mason
1.description: The trials of a master criminal defense attorney handling the most difficult cases in support of the innocent.

2.name: 2. 12 Angry Men
2.description: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.

3.name: 3. Beaver
3.description: The misadventures of a suburban boy, family and friends.

4.name: 4. Raintree County
4.description: A student falls in love with a Southern belle, but their relationship is complicated by her troubled past and the onset of the Civil War.

5.name: 5. Wagon Train
5.description: Stories of the journeys of a wagon train as it leaves post-Civil War Missouri on its way to California through the plains, deserts, and Rocky Mountains.

6.name: 6. Legend of the Lost
6.description: American ne'er-do-well Joe January is hired to take Paul Bonnard on an expedition into the desert in search of treasure.

7.name: 7. The Bridge on the River Kwai
7.description: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

8.name: 8. Det Sjunde Inseglet
8.description: A knight returning to Sweden after the Crusades seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

9.name: 9. Paths of Glory
9.description: After a failed attack on a German position, a general orders three soldiers, chosen at random, court-martialed for cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

10.name: 10. Tales of Wells Fargo
10.description: Agent Jim Hardie splits his life between being an agent helping Wells Fargo cope with bad guys, and owning a ranch near San Francisco, California.

11.name: 11. An Affair to Remember
11.description: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

12.name: 12. Witness for the Prosecution
12.description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

13.name: 13. Knight Without Armor
13.description: The adventures of a gentlemanly gunfighter-for-hire.

14.name: 14. Peyton Place
14.description: A peaceful New England town hides secrets and scandals.

15.name: 15. Old Yeller
15.description: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

16.name: 16. Maverick
16.description: Bret and Bart Maverick are well-dressed gamblers who migrate from town to town always looking for a good game.

17.name: 17. Smultronstället
17.description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

18.name: 18. Plan 9 from Outer Space
18.description: Evil aliens attack Earth and set their terrible "Plan 9" into action. As the aliens resurrect the dead of the Earth, the lives of the living are in danger.

19.name: 19. A Man in the Crowd
19.description: Female radio reporter Marcia Jeffries turns folk-singing drifter Larry "Lonesome" Rhoades into a powerful media star who becomes utterly detestable during his meteoric rise.

20.name: 20. Zorro
20.description: Don Diego de la Vega opposes the corrupt tyrants of Spanish California as the masked swordsman, Zorro.

21.name: 21. The Wayward Bus
21.description: Three strangers - a stripper, an alcoholic wife and a travelling salesman - embark on a life-changing journey. As the road presents challenges, each character faces his or her own shortcomings, not knowing where life will lead next.

22.name: 22. The Castle of the Spider's Web
22.description: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

23.name: 23. Sweet Smell of Success
23.description: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

24.name: 24. Funny Face
24.description: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

25.name: 25. 3:10 to Yuma
25.description: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.
